events.message: We have successfully received the application from the candidate interested in the software engineer position.
The candidate’s application has been categorized under Engineering due to keywords related to software development and coding experience.
A recruiter has been assigned to manage the next steps of the hiring process for the software engineer role.
The initial screening call was conducted to evaluate the candidate’s experience with software development and their technical skills.
The candidate responded promptly confirming availability for the next interview stages and expressed enthusiasm about the Engineering role.
A technical interview with the engineering team has been scheduled to assess the candidate’s coding abilities and problem-solving skills.
The technical interview was completed successfully with positive feedback from the interviewers regarding the candidate’s programming knowledge.
An HR interview has been scheduled to discuss the candidate’s fit with company culture and to go over benefits and policies.
The HR interview was completed with the candidate displaying alignment with the company values and enthusiasm about the position.
An offer has been proposed to the candidate outlining the role, salary, and benefits for the software engineer position.
The candidate has responded positively to the offer, requesting slight clarifications but showing strong interest in joining the team.
The candidate has formally accepted the offer, confirming their start date and eagerness to begin working with the engineering team.
The onboarding process has started for the new software engineer, including account setups and initial orientation sessions.
All recruitment and onboarding activities are completed, and the hire is now officially closed with the candidate fully onboarded.
